comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Download the attached test.js 2. java -jar compiler.jar --jscomp_error checkTypes --js test.js What is the expected output? What do you see instead? I expected to see: test.js:7: ERROR - inconsistent return type found : string required: number return m[0]; ^ 1 error(s), 0 warning(s), 100.0% typed Instead, I saw no errors at all What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? I'm on OS X 10.6.8 using the following version: Closure Compiler (http://code.google.com/closure/compiler) Version: 1346 Built on: 2011/08/11 15:02 Please provide any additional information below. The attached patch might fix the problem, although I haven't tested it. My reading of ECMA-262 5.1 section 15.10.6.2 suggests it's correct.
